MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the KA19 postcode area of Maybole, affecting properties in Kirklandhill Path and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 07:11am. Our engineers have arrived on site and are investigating the cause of the fault.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 10:15am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 09:47am on the 12th of January 2021
